text: @SenSchumer Chuck you’re a complete idiot coronavirus is a huge scam the numbrpers dont add up where’s the numbers of everyday deaths ? You know chuck like in 2018 an average of 145 died everyday in NYS ?   Dems are full of shit and you’re at the top of the scam!🇺🇸🇺🇸❤️
